tool_description: Archives backup files to long-term storage locations before deletion, maintaining metadata and enabling future retrieval if needed.
error_messages: Source files not accessible: Some files in source_paths cannot be read due to permissions or missing files.
Archive location invalid: The archive_location path is not writable or does not exist.
Compression level invalid: compression_level must be an integer between 0 and 9.
Archive limit exceeded: Maximum 1000 files can be archived in a single operation.
usage: Provide source_paths of backups to archive and archive_location for storage. Configure compression_level and verification options based on your requirements.

archive_results.description: Archive results for each file in format: source_path|archive_path|status|compression_ratio

failed_archives.description: List of files that failed to archive with error reasons

archive_summary.description: Summary of archival operation including total size saved and success rate
